DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to help establish a urinary threshold for salmeterol on the World Anti-doping Agency prohibited list, to avoid supratherapeutic of this substance in competitive sports. Hence, there is no hypothesis as such.
DOC.criteria: Male 1845 years Healthy Chronic disease Smoking Habitual use of medicine Allergy towards salmeterol Unable to exercise on a bike ergometer
